website_summaries.verdict: The full-featured DVD player to choose if you want to avoid having to replace your existing headrests.
pros: Uses a unique mounting adapter that fits in between the posts of an existing headrest
No need to replace the headrest with a separate unit
The screen is larger than traditional headrest DVD players, making it easier to view
cons: Monitor mount may require extra securing depending on your vehicle

customer_reviews.title: Wish we had these sooner!
customer_reviews.text: Got two of these for each of my kids. My son loves playing the games and my daughter is amazed she can watch movies in the car! Keeps them both entertained and they’re easy to put in and take out. The screw can be a bit tricky lining up, so I just keep it on and remove the adjustable headrest attachment. Inside we can use it as a stand. It’s perfect! Love that it comes with both a cigarette charger and an outlet charger too! Good screen size and the sound is good! Only thing it doesn’t have are headphones.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Decent player
customer_reviews.text: Mounted nicely to the back of head rest although the screw that holds it in the mount is a bit difficult manipulate since there is no room for your fingers. The unit itself and remote are nice and straightforward. As for the DVD player, I can't get the DVD to eject by pushing the eject button while using it. I have to shut it off and turn back in and then push eject button for disc to come out. The disc starts where you last left off which is nice. The games are very basic Atari style games from the 80s.
customer_reviews.author: 99Army

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and doesn’t skip when it’s bumpy
customer_reviews.text: This is the DVD player I bought and as far as quality It is really good! So far the DVDs have not skipped while going over bumps, therefore I am very pleased with this DVD player for my kids in the car. I am willing to purchase a second one as well.
customer_reviews.author: Stamatina H.

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't...
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working in less than 24 hours. When it did work, it had a really slow transition. Had to be turned off repeatedly for the few times it did work.
customer_reviews.author: Checkmate57

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the $
customer_reviews.text: So glad I purchased this small dvd player for my car. It has made car rides less calmer for my 2 year old granddaughter and myself. Easy to install and remove for use in your house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Received the product on time. It is a little larger than I expected which is nice. installation is super easy it's nice that the FM modulator keeps me from having to run a bunch of wiring. only need a power cable and tune the radio to the right station to use the car audio. nice that we can move this from car to car as well. very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ward Cauthren

customer_reviews.title: Great company !!!
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely the best company !!! Had a problem with the DVD player and they immediately got back to me and will be replacing it. Very impressed. Thank you so much. Also very friendly .
customer_reviews.author: Lynnette Cash

customer_reviews.title: This one is good
customer_reviews.text: Great Product, beautiful picture. I also love that unlike other models this one is equipped to fit different size headrests.
customer_reviews.author: Heath

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Service!
customer_reviews.text: Great DVD player for vacations or long trips. Has multiple functions and responds great. Very clear picture and plays all my DVD's. I would rate this as 5 stars and highly recommend purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Preferred Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to install. We liked it so much we bought another one!
customer_reviews.author: Kim B.

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to install and had great video and sound
customer_reviews.text: Bought this DVD player one month ago. It was easy to install and had great video and sound. Unfortunately, it completely stopped reading discs. Customer service has been very nice, but told me to put a positive review with 5 stars in order to get a new one. I will update this review based on if they do or don’t stick to their promise.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Young

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far!!
customer_reviews.text: Picture is great, sound is a bit quiet but I have not used the radio function. I love that it attaches to the headrest!! We will see on durability. I have had it only four months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my Grandchild ocupied
customer_reviews.text: Did the trick keeps her entertained and was easy to install!
customer_reviews.author: Armand H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This screen was bigger then expected. It was exactly what we were looking for we use it in the car on long trips and then take it in the hotel so are little one can watch his shows. Great product. Also seller is very fast to response to any questions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best DVD ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST DVD player that i have purchased. Will be buying a second one for the other grand-family.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very good product and good price. Good company to deal with, they are very reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Florence M

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and install. Kids love it. This could be 5+ stars if they made the following improvements (a) provide power via USB, (b) clearer instructions on the use of all the wires they provide, and (c) a more intuitive remote control. Regardless, great value so far. I
customer_reviews.author: Stan S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install in minutes. Great picture and very user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Murdock

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for what we needed. Picture quality is better than expected. Would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Michels

customer_reviews.title: Sound is terrible so far.
customer_reviews.text: The sound is terrible through FM. I tried every channel. There’s static and it only plays on the front speakers in the vehicle and not the back so static just comes from them. I don’t know what the problem is but I’m going to return it if using the aux connection doesn’t fix the issue. As for that-it doesn’t appear that I have one in w the box-just stuff to hard wire it seems. I hope I can figure it out bc it looks really nice and the headrest Mount is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Tonner

customer_reviews.title: Bumped up box and misleading listing!
customer_reviews.text: Box arrived bumped up and was obviously opened before yet was charged and sent as a "brand new" item. As well from some pictures it appears as if this is a set of screens and made sense since it's the same price range as other listings with two screens....... Nope just one screen is included...
customer_reviews.author: abe fisher

customer_reviews.title: E Rapta DVD player delivers as promised
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item as a gift for a friend to help relieve the stress of her little girl crying every time she was in the car.WE set it up in the back seat facing the car seat and now the little girl laughs and enjoys herself watching mickey mouse and donald duck; Not to mention the relief of being able to drive around and not hear your child crying. I highly recommend this product; its easy to install, easy to operate and delivers as promised. Can't say enough about this E Raptor DVD Player.
customer_reviews.author: john tucarella

customer_reviews.title: Nice everything especially input, output options.
customer_reviews.text: While I did get a chance to check it out, I ended up returning it for a dual display after wife screamed at me for getting only a single display. The features were excellent. Would've kept it had I been able to get only a second display.
customer_reviews.author: Bill C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: Not bad at all for the price. Had to return one unit after first week because it would automatically turn off after about an hour of watching a movie, but customer support was very quick to reply and sent a replacement the following week. Replacement seems to be a different model, but of higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: DutchSamoan

customer_reviews.title: No signal error
customer_reviews.text: It was working great until I started to get a “no signal” error on it that won’t go away
customer_reviews.author: S. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Update: Not reliable. Doesn’t play a lot of new DVD’s . Frustrated customer!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this DVD player and it didn’t play all the DVD’s. I had thrown the box away and couldn’t return it. I contacted the company and they responded immediately, shipping me a new one within. 3 days. They were so kind and professional. It’s nice to have such a good experience when something doesn’t quite work right. The new DVD player is perfect. Great sound and color. UPDATE!! This DVD player does not play half of Disney DVD’d. Very frustrating. Has not been reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, great DVD player for car headrest
customer_reviews.text: The manual is a little skimpy, but it was easy to install and worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Thomsen

customer_reviews.title: Help with failed dvd player
customer_reviews.text: I bought this july 20 2018 and it stopped working already. Is there anyway you can help me? Alot of money to have it stop working already.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette

customer_reviews.title: Good DVD player
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes we have to unplug and plug it back in to get it going but my daughter enjoys it. I bought this one so that she can't take the DVDs out herself. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Moore

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install, nice picture quality and sound
customer_reviews.text: Our kids are having a great time during travel. They change DVD by themselves. The picture quality and sound is great so far.
customer_reviews.author: cmandadi

customer_reviews.title: JUNK
customer_reviews.text: I originally write a great 4 star review but I just deleted it because we have had this since July 2018 and in January 2019 it went bad and stopped working. The screen is totally shot. I’m sure the second one isn’t far off. Do NOT be fooled by these reviews - they offer some free gift for a 5 star review. It is junk. We paid 150.00 for something that lasted 6 months and they will not replace.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation and set up!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up! TV has a great picture. The player has automatic playback and wireless headphone capability. Great purchase so far!
customer_reviews.author: Emily G

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST HEADREST
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Good quality materials, image and features. I recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Works amazing
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Works amazing! Sizing is perfect , clear picture and the sound is loud. My kids love it. Very sturdy compare to most dvd players. Does not skip when we drive on a bumpy road! Customer service is fenomonal Quick respond and was very helpful! Selina was who i dealt with shes great!. Very satisfied!would definitely recommend to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: So, so product
customer_reviews.text: Navigating the menu is painful and slow. It is not a touch screen so you have to use up/down arrows along the side of the screen to get to the menu. The pre-programmed radio stations are limited to three options. The quality of the audio coming out of the radio was poor and required the volume to be all the way up. We ended up using a three-way stereo Splitter Audio Cable with headphones so they could listen with better quality. The two DVD players survived the 2,000 summer trip so are durable. We bought two of them and connected them with the included cables so we only needed one dvd to show on both devices.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great unit for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Nice design, easy to install and use. Worked reliably for a year and when a small issue came up after 13 months, the manufacturer was very responsive and honored the two year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Great product so far.
customer_reviews.text: Great size screen. I like how you can tilt up or down! I have it to distract my 3 month old on drives. My 6 year old wants one now too, instead of his tablet. I've only had it for a week.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Bragg

customer_reviews.title: Not such a good investment
customer_reviews.text: After two months of use the tv started blowing the fuses in our daughters 2017 thruck and my husbands 2019 brand new truck. So sad that I paid so much money and it’s worthless after two months
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Phelps

customer_reviews.title: Good DVD player.
customer_reviews.text: Good DVD player. Clarity is great and it’s easy to install and use.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk..
customer_reviews.text: Was happy with it at first but after 5 months it has quit working.. idk if mine is faulty or what but that's $200 wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Headrest DVD Player for Car Can Use Both in Car or at Home as DVD Player eRapta Second Generation
feature_bullets: ►Headrest DVD Player For Car: Enjoy Your Life When In Travelling For Kids Entertainment, With this Headrest DVD; Make Your Trip More Harmonious and Happy.

►Car DVD Player with Suction Type Optical Drive: It Will Load the Disc Automatically When Insert. DVDs Will Not Damage by Rude Manual Insert Like Old Model. Save Disc’s Life and Much Easy for Children to Insert DVD by Themselves, DVD Need Back Face You When Insert.
►Portable DVD Design: A Way Can Enjoy Movies or Study at Home with It. More Sources We Can Share What We Have, Not Just From DVD, But Also From USB
►Easy to Install:Complete kits Easy Installation,just need to attach to the car headrest by included mounts.It also can be used at home. Multiple Format Function:CD,DVD,USB,SD,MP4,AVI,MKV,MP3,ect.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars67 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
